block.p: Jeanne Lisabeth Wesel, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Winfried E. Wesel of Upper St. Clair, Pa., was married yesterday to Thomas Steven Ross, a son of Mr. and Mrs. George A. Ross of Closter, N.J. The Rev. William DeBiase, a Roman Catholic priest, performed the ceremony at the Church of St. James in Basking Ridge, N.J.

Jeanne Lisabeth Wesel, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Winfried E. Wesel of Upper St. Clair, Pa., was married yesterday to Thomas Steven Ross, a son of Mr. and Mrs. George A. Ross of Closter, N.J. The Rev. William DeBiase, a Roman Catholic priest, performed the ceremony at the Church of St. James in Basking Ridge, N.J.

Mrs. Ross, 31, manages department store retail accounts for the Joseph Abboud Company, a maker of men's clothing in New York. She graduated from Pennsylvania State University. Mr. Ross, 32, is a financial consultant in the Paramus, N.J., office of Merrill Lynch. He graduated from Rutgers University and received a master's degree in finance from the New Jersey Institute of Technology.
